name: my-node-app
description: /my-node-app │── /src                  # Main source code │   ├── /config           # Configuration files (e.g., environment variables) │   ├── /controllers      # Controller functions for handling requests │   ├── /models           # Database models (if using MongoDB, Sequelize, etc.) │   ├── /routes           # Route definitions (Express routers) │   ├── /middlewares      # Custom middleware functions │   ├── /services         # Business logic and external API calls │   ├── /utils            # Utility functions/helpers │   ├── /views            # Views (for server-side rendering, if applicable) │   ├── app.js            # Main application file (sets up Express, middleware) │   ├── server.js         # Server entry point (starts the Node.js server) │ │── /public               # Static assets (CSS, JavaScript, images) │── /tests                # Unit and integration tests │── /logs                 # Log files │── /.env                 # Environment variables │── /.gitignore           # Git ignore file │── /package.json         # Node.js package manifest │── /package-lock.json    # Package lock file │── /README.md            # Project documentation
